title: Article 1 - Traffic Rules, Regulations and Toll Rates
content:
Article 1 - Traffic Rules, Regulations and Toll Rates

State Regulations

Part 1200 - Conditions Of Use And Definitions (§ 1200.1 to 1200.3)

Part 1201 - General Traffic Rules (§ 1201.1 to 1201.5)

Part 1202 - Roadway Regulations (§ 1202.1 to 1202.8)

Part 1203 - Traffic Permitted On Bridge Sidewalks (§ 1203.1 to 1203.3)

Part 1204 - Restricted Traffic (§ 1204.0 to 1204.3)

Part 1205 - Prohibited Traffic (§ 1205.0 to 1205.3)

Part 1206 - Toll Rates And Reduced Rate Tickets (§ 1206.1 to 1206.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
